Of course this is all theoretical and for fun only:)
 For starters: How about feeding the body to pigs? They'll eat anything. I know this is from Hannibal, but some guy actually did that. If he exercised his right to remain silent, he would be free. Of course the guy was impulsive to begin with, otherwise he wouldn't have killed his friend. I'm thinking many people have used animals in the past to eat the remains without admitting to it.

post_info.post_title: Best way to dispose of a dead body?

Thing is, this method is now fairly well known, so were I investigating a 'dissapearance' I'd check to see what those pigs have been eating. 
 
 What about dissolve body in hydrochloric acid, throw remains in sea?

What about putting the body in a trash bag and letting the trash man take the body. They just might be thinking "Dang, that guys got a hefty amount of trash this week. Then if they get stopped by the cops, it's the trash men who have the dead body in the back of their vehicle. After all, I think that's what the illegal thing is is that it's illegal to have a dead body in the back of your vehicle unless maybe it's a funeral car.
 
 This is of course if you're talking about a human's body. After all, if you're heartless enough at the time to murder someone, what's to stop you from being willing to let someone else take the blame?

or you could eat it. When the cops question you ask if they want some food and serve it to them. Make sure to add lots of spices so they can't tell what it is :). The evidence would literally be right under their noses (and in their mouths).

Surely the obvious way is to make it look like natural causes and let the system in place deal with it. 
 
 Failing that it would depend on your situation, pigs only work if you are actually a pig farmer as otherwise you have to be excessively careful that your car isn't spotting at the pig farm or even going there. Not to mention that you do need to cut the body in bits, you can't just give them a whole body to deal with which then raises issues of containment.
 Dumping them out to sea, would probably be the easiest to dispose of the body and to set up a reasonable explaination for being there. Just have to pay attention to the prevailing winds and tides so it becomes somebodies else's problem.
I don't know what the best way is, but I sure as heck know I shouldn't chop it into several pieces and bury it under the floorboards before the police get there, cuz the heart keeps beating.
Identify it as a terrorist to US Homeland Security.

Thing is, this method is now fairly well known, so were I investigating a 'dissapearance' I'd check to see what those pigs have been eating. 
 
 What about dissolve body in hydrochloric acid, throw remains in sea?

 
 That was done by a guy in India, as I recall, the judge sentenced him to the same treatment.

That was done by a guy in India, as I recall, the judge sentenced him to the same treatment.

 
 ouch, did he at least get to die first, or was that the cause of death?

ouch, did he at least get to die first, or was that the cause of death?

 Actually, there was no comment given that the guy actually died. He could have lived through it. Granted, that would be cruel and unusual punishment but then again, it's another country.

What about simply dropping the body off somewhere remote? If one's careful about the actual crime, and unless there's a motive or link (ie, not your loud neighbor, lying ex-girlfriend, etc) then you're pretty much in the clear when the body is discovered.
 Considering feeding pigs, should one use a wood chipper? You could conceivably get rid of the body over the course of a week in the forest or a body of water.

Of course this is all theoretical and for fun only:)

 I beginning to wonder if that's really true. Who is it you have in mind nazsmith? emoticon_xangel

yall have it all wrong, sure pigs or animals or maybe even the trash. Yall are forgetting the easiest way to get rid of a body.....burn it. There is literally no forensical evidence of a body left, all you have to worry about is the teeth i think.

I beginning to wonder if that's really true. Who is it you have in mind nazsmith? emoticon_xangel

 
 
 Who says it hasn't already been done? emoticon_xangel

Oldish thread, but I've been away...
 
 *sigh*
 
 All the methods described leave evidence.
 
 A hog can not digest teeth nor hair. Hair can be burnt though and teeth ground up with a hammer...
 
 Unless you burnt the body better than a crematorium, it'll leave chunks. Like the heart.
 
 Ted Bundy used the fluffy animals of the wilderness as his disposal. But, sometimes there's remains found and it's not always guaranteed...stoopid hikers and kids looking around all the time.
 
 Dumping it in the ocean, like really far out, in small chunks could work...provided no Coast Guard come snooping around. Also, you have to be careful when chunking it. Blood is easily tracable even when you thought you scrubbed it all off and all chunks have to be accounted for...a loose finger and you're in trouble.
 
 Wood chipper is out. All that does is spray DNA evidence everywhere and small chunks of brain tissue. Did you know you need brain tissue? Yep, a simply missing persons (foul play suspected) is murder if brain tissue is found.
 
 Personally, just kill them in a moment of passion. Get a good lawyer. Sacrifice some goats to an idol and take your sentence like a mensch. You'll probably be out in a couple of years with good behavior. Heck, you'd probably be offered a plea deal too to manslaughter or something equally ridiculous...
 
 Because unless you know what you're doing all you'd end up accomplishing is making your inevitable sentence longer.
 
 However, if I were seeking to try to 'get away with murder'. Break into a country home, steal a revolver or bolt action rifle (leaves no shell casings)
 Learn targets standard habits.
 Day of hit, steal van.
 Either shoot target with bolt action rifle (better be a good shot) from a distance or up close with revolver.
 Ditch van and set it on fire.
 Ram rat-tail file down weapons barrel and drop weapon in river.
 Dispose of clothing (bought at DAV or Salvation army store) worn by burning in country side.
 Bath bath bath bath...at a friends or relatives home.
 
 Of course, if your target even remotly can be tied to a drug case.
 Simply walk up on them in a parking lot, say "Guess what I learned in Evil Overlord School?" and when they say 'What?' simply shoot them a couple of times in the head and toss a handfull of packets of druggies on the ground and about 20-30 dollars in small bills. Voila, drug deal gone bad.
 (Be careful how you toss the items down though. Make it look like you're retrieving them while actually depositing them. Why? CAMERAS are every where!)
 
 Of course, you could also kill their neighbors too in a home invasion style approach. Make the police wonder which target was the true target and which one was a stupid mistake by a dumb criminal. Works better if the neighbor is someone that someone else wants dead. 'Motive'.
 
 Or, you could advertise on the internet...yeah...that's a sure fire winner. 
 Try a site like Cannibal_president.US.gov 
 
 But, really, disposing of a body is soooo unnecessary.
 Heck, you could put it in your passenger seat and use the carpool lane. 
 Or set it on your desk as a novel paper weight. 
 Or put it in the corner as a coat and hat rack. 
 Dead bodies are so common anymore that no one even notices. 
 Did you know that 59% of all marriages are comprised of one or more dead bodies? 
 And that 37% of all teachers in public schools and 22% of private schools are dead bodies?
 It's a proven fact that a whopping 87% of all elected officials are dead bodies. 
 And let's not forget that ALL of middle management is comprised of dead bodies.
 
 
 
 Ironically,
 
 I'm being deposed on Tuesday by a infamous local lawyer.
 Lucky for me It's in regards to a divorce.
 More so since my lawyer is better and I'm currently 'winning'.
 
 God I love the law!
 
 
 <Disclaimer<
 I am not now nor have a I ever been convicted of a crime.
 I am not now nor have I ever been guilty of a crime.
 I refuse to waive ANY of my rights.
 I refuse to answer any questions without the pressance of a lawyer.
 I do wish to tell you mr. police officer sir to **** my ****. 
 Yes, I do hope you tase me and abuse me on camera.
 Yes, I will be filing multiple lawsuits.
 Yes, I do plan on being compensated for my injuries and suffering.
 
 
 *The preceeding was for entertainment purposes. The writer is not responsible for the consequences should anyone be so foolish as to follow any of the advice given.*

 Feeling a little PARANOID doz?

 You know it occurs to me this guy should probably be watched.

I got a good one. Shoot 'em with a small caliber pistol in the head, back preferrably. Wrap body in a net. If you live on the coast, take him where there are alot of crabs because the crabs will devour all the tissue the hair and teeth will sink and the skeleton will to. if not take them to a lake with catfish in it and throw them in. 
 
 Another where you don't have to hide the body is knock 'em out and pack the throat with snow. 
 
 One more, strip 'em down, wrap 'em in razor wore, put them in the back of a car, then fill the car with gas and nitrous oxide and throw in a match

Use a minor spell to paralyze them to give you enough time to summon a firestorm to burn away their very being. When the only thing left is ash all you have to do is lift it into the air using your telekinesis and drop it into an ash tray. Mind probe of everyone who saw it and wipe their memory and be sure to have an illlusion spell keeping the cameras from detecting you. (If they have a lot of money on them be sure to take it while they are still paralyzed.) Piece of cake. emoticon_xgood

post_info.post_title: You've been going about this all wrong.

I believe the thread was started to try and dispose of an already dead body; not on how to dispose of the person themselves.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Best way to dispose of a dead body?
